cleaned_text: The main goals of these lectures are : To understand the basics of alternative and complementary medicine and its application in therapeutics. To get knowledge about the available (OTC) various herbal preparations, nutritional supplements and homeopathy. To get knowledge about the role of the pharmacist to help clients make an informed choice of available products/techniques as well as monitoring the client use of these products.
